General.Name: Kri-Kri Milk Industry S.A
General.Description: Kri-Kri Milk Industry S.A. produces and sells dairy products in Greece. The company offers ice creams, yogurt, milk, and other products. It also exports its products to approximately 24 countries in Europe, the Balkans, and the Middle East. The company was founded in 1954 and is headquartered in Serres, Greece.
General.Address: 3rd km Nat. Road of Serres-Drama, Serres, Greece, 62125
